a.n: Fred Pallem & Le Sacre du Tympan

p.k: Fred Pallem & Le Sacre du Tympan 2015. Fred Pallem & Le Sacre du Tympan. New Morning, Paris, France
p.d: Under the musical direction of Fred Pallem, the ensemble Le Sacre du Tympan delivers a tribute to the music of Fran√ßois de Roubaix, who can be described as the French equivalent of film composer Ennio Morricone. In this passionate concert recorded at the New Morning Club of Paris in 2015, Pallem and Le Sacre du Tympan display an unequaled knowledge of the magical repertoire of Roubaix, and bring back to life his music with special guests!
